import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl } from '@angular/forms' import { TarefaService } from './tarefa.service' import { Tarefa } from './tarefa'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { tarefas: Tarefa[] = [] form: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ description : new FormControl('') }) constructor( private service: TarefaService ){ } submit(){ const tarefa: Tarefa = { ...this.form.value } this.service .salvar(tarefa) .subscribe(tarefaSalva => { this.tarefas.push(tarefaSalva) this.form.reset() }) } }
Tarefas Control

Tarefas
